item.title: TSM
item.description: score:192 Chances: TSMC has reclaimed a spot among the world’s top 10 most valuable companies, driven by optimism in artificial intelligence. item.title: ZI
item.description: score:32 Chances: Shares of ZoomInfo jumped 6.9% after a notable analyst upgrade, indicating positive market sentiment towards the stock. The stock trades at a 50% discount valuation to its software peers, leaving lots of runway for multiple expansion. Risks: The company is considered controversial, which could lead to increased volatility in the stock price.

item.title: DDOG
item.description: score:20 Chances: Datadog’s impressive earnings surprise history and strong positioning in the AI space indicate a potential for future growth. The company’s upcoming Investor Day and financial results announcements could bring positive updates and investor confidence. Risks: The recent sale of shares by the Chief Technology Officer may raise concerns about insider sentiment and future performance.

item.title: PAGS
